title: Looking for a bronze/silver ranked team or some nice chill people to play with
body: So after 3 years I've basically given up playing this game solo, its just too frustrating and not enough fun for me to keep playing like this. I'm just looking for a team or a group of people that I can play with so maybe I can find the fun in this game again. I'm silver 5, I play top/mid and have skype/discord.

replies.body: ill join in add "only top 0" just finished getting it to 30 looking for flex group was a jg main on my main acc but play any role respectively well
Jump on discord.gg/xU22hbM if you want to play sometime :)
Hi, I used to be silver but now looking for a good team. I main ADC and MID. Username: RE44PR.

I can carry bot lane as adc and mid 
add me in game : IBronze5{{summoner:31}}

Yo I'm LimePunch and I have the same problem as you. Don't mind my match history as I was sharing my account with my little bro, however he plays really bad and got me demoted to Bronze 5 :(. Im a good player and i'm super kleen to join ur team mate :D. I play Top and Jungle
Sup main here looking for a new crew. play ranked only. keen to smash through the ranks!

Yoyo fitzky add me in LOL.username is kyonghwan. Chat me and we can duo. I main adc and top, currently sitting in g5. All i can say is... i feel your frustration brother solo queue can give you nughtmares!
